I've decided to redo Scenario #401 of my tortured set. (For those of 
you who don't know/remember, it's the one that takes a while to load.) 
 

I've figured out how to increase the amount of money given to the 
player by reducing the amount of gold in the scenario *without* 
changing the level number of the gold.

Meanwhile, I'm playing around with a super-charged Archer.  Literally, 
this guy is his own worst enemy because of exploding bolts.
